T02D2329:269b-1: manydzu shr'i kro dha s'a dha nam /
T02D2329:269b-4: smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2329:269b-5: dpal ldan khro bo gshin rje gshed //
T02D2329:269b-6: khro rgyal gtso la rab 'dud nas //
T02D2329:269b-7: de yi zab mo sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D2329:269b-8: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul du bri //
T02D2329:269b-9: de la 'jam dpal gshin rje sgrub par 'dod pa'i
T02D2329:269b-10: rnal 'byor pas dur khrod la sogs pa yid dang
T02D2329:269b-11: rjes su mthun par gnas su stan bde ba la
T02D2329:269b-12: 'dug ster rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khro
T02D2329:269b-13: bsgom / de'i dbus su h'um mthing nag rab tu 'bar ba bsgom /
T02D2329:269b-14: de las 'od 'phros pas bar chad thams cad srung
T02D2329:269b-15: zhing bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs dam bskur
T02D2329:269b-16: te / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs la /
T02D2329:269b-17: yan lag bdun pa bya zhing tshad med pa bzhi
T02D2329:269b-18: bsgoms te de ni sbod nams kyi tshogs bsag go
T02D2329:269b-19: // de nas aom sarba dharm'a bh'a ba sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02D2329:269b-20: zhes pas chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur bsgom //
T02D2329:270a-1: las rang gi rig pa h'um mthing nag rab tu 'bar bar bsgom /
T02D2329:270a-2: de gyur pa las rdo rje khro bo h'um gis mtshan par bsam /
T02D2329:270a-3: de las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin
T02D2329:270a-4: rje gshed mthing nag zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa
T02D2329:270a-5: / khro gnyer dpral bar bsdus pa /
T02D2329:270a-6: mche ba gtsigs shing skra gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D2329:270a-7: phyag g-yas kyis ral gri rdo rje'i yu ba can bzung ba /
T02D2329:270a-8: g-yon sdigs mdzub autpalas mtshan pa /
T02D2329:270a-9: gcer bu dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D2329:270a-10: yum rdo rje phag mo dang rol zhing ye shes kyi me 'bar ba /
T02D2329:270a-11: ma he gdan du bting nas las kyi gshin rje 'dul bar bsgom /
T02D2329:270a-12: de'i thugs ka nas h'um las 'od 'phros pas de
T02D2329:270a-13: lta bu'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la phyag
T02D2329:270a-23: zhes mchod pa dbul gtor ma gtang ngo //
T02D2329:270a-24: gtor snod mi dmigs pa las rin po che'i snod du bsam /
T02D2329:270a-25: h'um zhes brjod pas bdud rtsir bsam ;
T02D2329:270a-26: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D2329:270a-27: dza:h'um bam ho:sa dgug gzhug la sogs pa bya zhing /
T02D2329:270a-28: yi ge gsum gyis sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs /
T02D2329:270a-31: de nas bzlas pa'i sngags 'di yin te /
T02D2329:270a-32: a'om hr'i:shtri: bi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2329:270a-33: zhes nam mkha'i dkyil nas thog babs pa ltar shin tu drag par bzlas so //
T02D2329:270a-34: de nas sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin 'od gsal ba /
T02D2329:270a-36: rdo rje'i bzlas pa sems de la gtad pa'o //
T02D2329:270a-37: nag po thugs kyi dpal be'u nas //
T02D2329:270a-38: zab mo bdud rtsi'i bcud thigs pas //
T02D2329:270a-39: skal ldan rin chen lta bu yi //
T02D2329:270a-40: 'jam dpal gshin rje grub par shog /'jam dpal khor
